name: CKShare
desc: A specialized record type that manages a collection of shared records.

items.name: init(coder: NSCoder)
items.desc: Creates a share from a serialized instance.

items.name: init(rootRecord: CKRecord)
items.desc: Creates a new share for the specified record.

items.name: init(rootRecord: CKRecord, shareID: CKRecord.ID)
items.desc: Creates a new share for the specified record and record ID.

items.name: init(recordZoneID: CKRecordZone.ID)
items.desc: Creates a new share for the specified record zone.

items.name: var owner: CKShare.Participant
items.desc: The participant that represents the share’s owner.

items.name: var currentUserParticipant: CKShare.Participant?
items.desc: The participant that represents the current user.

items.name: var participants: [CKShare.Participant]
items.desc: An array that contains the share’s participants.

items.name: var url: URL?
items.desc: The URL for inviting participants to the share.

items.name: var publicPermission: CKShare.ParticipantPermission
items.desc: The permission for anyone with access to the share’s URL.

items.name: func addParticipant(CKShare.Participant)
items.desc: Adds a participant to the share.

items.name: func removeParticipant(CKShare.Participant)
items.desc: Removes a participant from the share.

items.name: class CKShare.Participant
items.desc: An object that describes a user’s participation in a share.

items.name: class CKShare.Metadata
items.desc: An object that describes a shared record’s metadata.

items.name: enum CKShare.SystemFieldKey
items.desc: Constants that represent the system fields of a share.
